title: This 2BR. 2 Bath unit features keyless entry, marble baths!!
posting_body: Lease at the Selden!
Located between Cass and Second, all the amenities that the City has to offer are at your fingertips.
This luxury condo development with a design-forward appeal features beautiful top-of-the-line finishes that set this apart from the rest of the market!
This 2BR. 2 Bath unit features keyless entry, marble baths, quartz countertops, and sleek European custom cabinets throughout.
Enjoy a chef's kitchen with an open concept, including a quartz waterfall island backdrop.
This unit boasts 10 foot ceilings and a beautiful balcony with west facing windows.
The roof-top lounge features a dog run and wash station and amazing views of the City.
One indoor climate controlled parking space with EV Charger is included.
Walk downstairs to the award-winning restaurant, SheWolf!
The main floor boasts an amazing master suite that you will fall in love with.
The private master bathroom has a large tub, separate shower, double sinks and a large walk-in closet.
The living room has an open concept and a cozy fireplace for your family to enjoy during the cool winter evenings.
TO APPLY we will need:
Completed application -- get your application from the Office!
Photo ID
Proof of income for the last 30 days
4. $1 (application fee)
This does get applied to your deposit upon approval!
Amenities include:
2 Large Pools
Pet Friendly
Laundry On-Site
24/7 On-Call Maintenance
Picnic Tables
Grilling Area
Trash, Water, & Pest Control Paid.
You only pay electricity for utilities!
Easy highway access
Easily set up Net Fiber Internet
Parking Off-Street
